pages.text: The ability to see beyond the physical world is referred to as $(thing)Third Eye$(). Humans do not possess such an ability to see $(thing)beyond the veil$(), however with certain substances and contraptions the knowledgeable summoner can work around this limitation.

The most comfortable - and most expensive - way to obtain this ability, is to wear spectacles infused with spirits, that $(o)lend$() their sight to the wearer. A slightly more nauseating, but very affordable alternative is the consumption of certain herbs, $(thing)$(l:getting_started/datura)Demons's Dream$(/l)$() most prominent among them.
